subject: Jigdo-* fields useless ?
body:
Hi,

In the list of mirrors, there are plenty of fields like :
Jigdo-ftp: /debian-cd/jigdo/
Jigdo-http: /debian-cd/jigdo/
Jigdo-rsync: /debian-cd/jigdo/

But :
- there is no separate jigdo directory anymore
- I don't see anything in the website using this fields

I guess we can remove all these fields safely ?

Regards,

-- 
Simon Paillard


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
